casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Moses Leon FAISON. No. 576P07. Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 6, 2008. Robert Montgomery, Special Deputy Attorney General, C. Branson Vickory, III, District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 3rd day of December 2007 by Defendant for Appropriate Relief:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference this the 6th day of March 2008."
